help-file.title: HARDCORE
help-file.content: When you create a character on Duris you have the option of creating it as "Hardcore". These characters are enhanced in most areas such as they do increased damage, have greater resistance to damage and have higher hp than non-hardcore characters. Hardcore characters also do not require the special "potions" as others do to move past level 50, they are able to simply exp right up to level 56. However they have a limited li e-span and will cease to exist completely upon the fifth death of the character.
